DOC.brief_summary: It hypothesize study couple Millon Behavioral Medicine Diagnostic , biopsychosocial evaluation , motivational interviewing , relapse prevention , ongoing support produce improve outcome diabetic previously unsuccessful traditional care . This study examine relationship patient ' HbA1c level patient ' involvement ASMART program , multifaceted program involve psychological intervention . The study conduct Kosciusko Health Department fund K21 Health Foundation .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Treatment Adherence With Integrated Program HbA1c Scores Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The study involve 182 Type 2 Diabetes patient HbA1c score 7 , reflect poor control diabetes . The experimental group consist 124 patient joined ASMART program , control group consist 60 patient continue receive traditional care . Statistical analysis involve compare pretest & posttest HbA1c level experimental group control group .
